app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Cam Translate OCR Translator
app_description: Cam Translate uses the latest in depth neural network of large language model LLM combined GPT with cloud image recognition technology to recognize text in images with high accuracy and to translate texts in multiple languages. When you travel street signs books recipes readily take a photo you can translate the language you need. Cam Translate App also has speech recognition capabilities using voice blur technology easily identify the voice content completely liberate your hands!
